titlealts.searchtitle: Data Element: TPRG-SEND TWO YEAR CORRECTED AGE OUTCOME ASSESSMENT SCORE (MALFORMATIONS QUESTION A) - Description

div.p: TPRG-SEND TWO YEAR CORRECTED AGE OUTCOME ASSESSMENT SCORE (MALFORMATIONS QUESTION A) is the PERSON SCORE for question A of the Malformations section of the TPRG-SEND Two Year Corrected Age Outcome Assessment.
The question asks "Does this child have a malformation identified at birth/within the first 2 years?".
